title.en: A word to the wise is enough.

synopsis:
With exciting new heroes gaining popularity and stardom, Tiger and Barnaby are called upon to set a good example.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: No one knows the weight of another's burden.

synopsis:
Now an official superhero, Subaru is eager to make his mark. Feeling desperate, he starts to get ahead of himself.

(Source: Netflix)

Karina decides to meet up with a lonely and sickly fan who says Blue Rose is her favorite superhero. She asks Tiger to come along too.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.

synopsis:
As the top-ranking superheroes, Sky High and Fire Emblem seem like the perfect buddy team; nevertheless, Nathan has one particular complaint.

(Source: Netflix)

After getting into an argument with Ivan, Antonio is worried that the Rock Bison and Origami Cyclone partnership won't survive.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Youth should be regarded with respect.

synopsis:
Lara and Pao-Lin seem to have perfect teamwork, but then Lara's overbearing mother convinces her to see Pao-Lin not as a partner, but as a rival.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Out of the mouth of babes oft time come gems.

synopsis:
Tiger is delighted - and a little surprised - when his daugther Kaede comes to the city to visit him with a friend.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: You can't judge a book by its cover.

synopsis:
=en
Subaru gets worried when his partner Thomas is reprimanded for being too violent when apprehending a robber.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Have not thy cloak to make when it begins to rain.

synopsis:
Tiger bends the rule to try to catch a violent NEXT named Vincent Carl, who left Barnaby badly injured while evading capture.

(Source: Netflix)

Fire Emblem and Sky High are found frozen, victims of an attack by a pair of NEXT suspects who've declared war on the city's superheroes.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Every cloud has a silver lining.

synopsis:
Agnes orders the superheroes to stand down and avoid confrontation with Hugan and Mugan, but soon they're faced with a double threat.

(Source: Netflix)

The remaining superheroes learn Hugan and Mugan's motives, and then put together a plan to defeat the powerful duo.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Constant dropping wears away a stone.

synopsis:
The superheroes are fighting as hard as they can, but Hugan and Mugan seem impossible to defeat.

(Source: Netflix)
